org.apache.ignite.ml.math

Interface VectorStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Destroyable, Externalizable, Serializable, StorageOpsMetrics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayVectorStorage, BlockVectorStorage, CacheVectorStorage, ConstantVectorStorage, DelegateVectorStorage, DenseLocalOffHeapVectorStorage, FunctionVectorStorage, MapWrapperStorage, MatrixVectorStorage, PivotedVectorStorage, RandomVectorStorage, SingleElementVectorDelegateStorage, SingleElementVectorStorage, SparseDistributedVectorStorage, SparseLocalOffHeapVectorStorage, SparseLocalOnHeapVectorStorage

    public interface VectorStorage
extends Externalizable, StorageOpsMetrics, Destroyable
    Data storage support for Vector.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default double[] data()
      Gets underlying array if StorageOpsMetrics.isArrayBased() returns true.

      void set(int i, double v)

    • Method Detail

      • size

        int size()

      • get

        double get(int i)
        Parameters:
        i - Vector element index.
        Returns:
        Value obtained for given element index.

         double v)
        Parameters:
        i - Vector element index.
        v - Value to set at given index.

      • data

        default double[] data()
        Gets underlying array if StorageOpsMetrics.isArrayBased() returns true. Returns null if in other cases.
        See Also:
        StorageOpsMetrics.isArrayBased()
